bibl.title: Greek Ostraka from the Mut Precinct, South Karnak.
Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall

bibl.note: Twelve ostraka found at the Precinct of Mut, South Karnak, by the Brooklyn Museum Mut Expedition. - 58. Inv. 2M.108a+b. Receipt for poll-tax and bath-tax, August 22, 39. - 59. Inv. 2M.93. Receipt for poll-tax and bath-tax, June 1, 34. - 60. Inv. 2M.3. Receipt for dyke-tax and bath-tax, late I BCE - early I CE. - 61. Inv. 2M.94. Receipt for bath-tax, May 1, 22. - 62. Inv. 2M.100. Receipt for bath-tax, April 9, 23. - 63. Inv. 2M.99. Receipt for bath(?)-tax, 23/24. - 64. Inv. 2M.12. School text (?), late I - early II. - 65. Inv. 23MW.20. Tax receipt, February 19, 20 or 23, 127? - 66. Inv. 23MW31. Tax receipt for a merismos, 130-150. - Descripta: 67. Inv. 2M.98. Document about a lease, ca. 10/11; - 68. Inv. 4M.94. Receipt (?); - 69. Inv. 4M.96. Text of uncertain nature. - Pp. 340-341: Appendix. Collectors of Bath-Tax Mentioned in Texts from the Theban Area, 15-35 CE.
bibl.seg: 142.4 O. Karnak Mut Exped. Inv. 2M.3 = O. Bagnall 60; 2M.12 = O. Bagnall 64; 2M.93 = O. Bagnall 59; 2M.94 = O. Bagnall 61; 2M.98 = O. Bagnall 67 descr.; 2M.99 = O. Bagnall 63; 2M.100 = O. Bagnall 62; 2M.108a+b = O. Bagnall 58; 4M.94 = O. Bagnall 68 descr.; 4M.96 = O. Bagnall 69 descr.; 23MW.20 = O. Bagnall 65; 23MW.31 = O. Bagnall 66
Klaas A. Worp, with a Preface by Richard Fazzini, Greek Ostraka from the Mut Precinct, South Karnak.

Rodney Ast, Hélène Cuvigny, Todd M. Hickey & Julia Lougovaya (edd.), Papyrological Texts in Honor of Roger S. Bagnall = American Studies in Papyrology. 53 (Durham, North Carolina, 2013) pp. 331-347, 13 figg.

Twelve ostraka found at the Precinct of Mut, South Karnak, by the Brooklyn Museum Mut Expedition. - 58. Inv. 2M.108a+b. Receipt for poll-tax and bath-tax, August 22, 39. - 59. Inv. 2M.93. Receipt for poll-tax and bath-tax, June 1, 34. - 60. Inv. 2M.3. Receipt for dyke-tax and bath-tax, late I BCE - early I CE. - 61. Inv. 2M.94. Receipt for bath-tax, May 1, 22. - 62. Inv. 2M.100. Receipt for bath-tax, April 9, 23. - 63. Inv. 2M.99. Receipt for bath(?)-tax, 23/24. - 64. Inv. 2M.12. School text (?), late I - early II. - 65. Inv. 23MW.20. Tax receipt, February 19, 20 or 23, 127? - 66. Inv. 23MW31. Tax receipt for a merismos, 130-150. - Descripta: 67. Inv. 2M.98. Document about a lease, ca. 10/11; - 68. Inv. 4M.94. Receipt (?); - 69. Inv. 4M.96. Text of uncertain nature. - Pp. 340-341: Appendix. Collectors of Bath-Tax Mentioned in Texts from the Theban Area, 15-35 CE.
